A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: (Spoiler Free) This felt like a good continuation of the new trilogy. The character development progresses in a pleasing way that I can see advancing even more so in the next film. I do not understand the people who are saying this is the worst movie of all the Star Wars... Not even close; get your head out of your ass and look at the prequels. With that said\, it is by no means a perfect movie\, it does have a few shortcomings. I will most definitely be seeing it again.
